properties.Speaker: Vulgrim
properties.Text: The one you seek lies beyond the demon barrier - use the horn to make your way.

properties.Speaker: Vulgrim
properties.Text: And remember, even the most unlikely of alliances can prove... beneficial.

properties.Speaker: Vulgrim
properties.Text: Return to me if you ever want to trade more souls.I have a few select items you might be interested in.

properties.Speaker: Vulgrim
properties.Text: I have a few select items you might be interested in.
